## Individual Articles

### Article 1: Show HN: Veru â€“ open-source AI citation auditor using OpenAlex

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://github.com/Yinghao-Guan/Veru)

## Summary

Veru launched an open-source AI citation auditor that addresses LLM hallucination in academic research by verifying citations against academic databases. The tool uses a three-tier verification system checking OpenAlex, Semantic Scholar, and Google Search, powered by Google Gemini 2.0 for citation extraction and content consistency verification. Built with Next.js and Python FastAPI, the MIT-licensed solution targets researchers needing to validate AI-generated academic citations.
